 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Vision 2033 – 33 Days Challenge

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1961&user=10620> 	

Day 2 of our Vision 2033 – 33-Day Challenge! Many thanks to Nasser Al Blooshi our Managing Director - UAE for sharing insights on the UAE country management team's crucial contribution to Bridging Horizons.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

Welcoming Michelle Hudson

We are delighted to welcome Michelle Hudson as Senior Executive Assistant to the People & Culture President. 
With over 15 years’ experience supporting C-Level Executives across international organizations, Michelle brings expertise in executive support, project management, and board coordination.
